## Fixture.parent property

The parent element that the view was appended to.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
parent: HTMLElement;
```

## Remarks

This element will be appended to the DOM only after [Fixture.connect()](./foundation-testing.fixture.connect.md) has been called.
